meanings.definition: To make something individual or unique to a particular person.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys personalizing her gifts by adding special touches for each friend.
meanings.sent2: I am personalizing this notebook with her name to make it special.
meanings.sent3: He tried personalizing his pet rock by giving it a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The artist was personalizing the painting with intricate details that reflected the subject's personality.
meanings.sent5: The chef was personalizing each dish with a unique presentation to impress the guests.

meanings.definition: To tailor something to suit an individual's preferences or needs.
meanings.sent1: They are personalizing the training program to meet each employee's learning style.
meanings.sent2: The company is personalizing the customer experience to increase satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: She was personalizing her outfit by adding quirky accessories.
meanings.sent4: The tailor was personalizing the suit to fit the client perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was personalizing the lesson plans to accommodate different student abilities.
